articles.title: Researchers find cause of irregular heart rhythm in Covid patients - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: The SARS-CoV-2, the virus causing Covid-19, can infect cells of the heart's natural pacemaker that maintain the rhythmic beat, setting off a self-destruction process within the cells, according to a preclinical study.
